reviewText: If you are an African American and you have dreams of moving to Africa, this documentary is excellent. A must buy

Black people in America are taught negative things about Africa to lower their self esteem and disconnect them from there homeland. This Documentary shows how African Americans are moving to Africa to and Investing there and doing things in South Africa that would not be possible to do in America in Business.
This was so amazing. A very good and informative DVD for anyone thinking about moving to South Africa
